sentences.en: A hot bath is a great refreshment after a day's work.
sentences.cn: 在一天工作之后洗个热水澡真是舒畅.

sentences.en: a place to rest and find refreshment for mind and body
sentences.cn: 休息和恢复身心的场所

sentences.en: Amid life's worries we find refreshment in poetry.
sentences.cn: 在人生忧烦中我们在诗里寻得怡适.

sentences.en: At a thousand houses they knocked, and a thousand times they were refused rest and refreshment.
sentences.cn: 他们敲了一千户人家的门, 但是每一次都被拒绝了,既不能在那里休息,也得不到食物.

sentences.en: Having not yet lunched, we went to the refreshment bar for ham sandwiches.
sentences.cn: 我们都没吃午饭，于是便去小吃店买了火腿三明治。

sentences.en: He needs to stop fairly often for refreshment.
sentences.cn: 他须时不时地停下来喘口气.

sentences.en: Her young nature eluded the irradiating brain, in search of refreshment.
sentences.cn: 她年轻的本性在寻求欢乐的时候避开了理智的头脑.

sentences.en: I had a pepsi at a refreshment booth round the corner.
sentences.cn: 我在转角处的餐饮摊喝了一杯百事可乐.

sentences.en: I hurried down to the platform and into the refreshment room , Steve was nowhere to be seen.
sentences.cn: 我匆忙赶到月台,又跑进小吃部,还是没看见史蒂夫.

sentences.en: I like sitting out dances in the refreshment room.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢跳舞,宁可坐在小吃部里.

sentences.en: May I offer you some refreshment?
Ralph took his refreshment wherever he could find it.
sentences.cn: 拉尔夫在一切可能的地方寻找他的乐趣.

sentences.en: Refreshments will be served after the meeting.
The fee includes seminar materials, certificate of attendance and refreshment.
sentences.cn: 费用包括研讨会资料 、 证书、茶歇.

sentences.en: The spectators dropped off to get refreshment.
sentences.cn: 旁观者纷纷离座去吃点心.

sentences.en: They will be laying on liquid refreshment to fortify brides-to-be for the shopping extravaganza ahead.
sentences.cn: 他们将为准新娘们准备些酒，好让她们接下来有充沛精力疯狂购物。

sentences.en: We worked all day without refreshment.
sentences.cn: 我们不吃不喝地工作了一整天。

sentences.en: Would you care to partake of some refreshment?
